metadata.title: CVE-2021-34148 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The Bluetooth Classic implementation in the Cypress WICED BT stack through2.9.0 for CYW20735B1 devices does not properly handle the reception ofLMP_max_slot with a greater ACL Length after completion of the LMP setupprocedure, allowing attackers in radio range to trigger a denial of service(firmware crash) via a crafted LMP packet.

criterions.comment: bluez-firmware package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
